content: Some of You people rant and rave about free trade, and the right a company has to do business where it wants while what our government was founded upon gets trampled. We use to be enemies with human right abusers, now they are our "friends" all for the sake of the all mighty dollar. I Hope some of you are proud of yourselves for supporting this type of behavior that sends the message, it does not matter how you treat people, we will still do business with you. Add China to that list as well. content: Their religious police are determined to go down fighting, losing a lot of prestige and power recently. Women are now taking positions in teaching, medical, business and government. The King has recently replaced the head clergy that determines the tone in the Mosque each Friday. How far this interference will go you can only hope. To make such a ruling on a 75 year old woman is a death sentence, begs for invention.

content: You know the reason nobody can find bin Laden? Because he is living in Saudi, in comfort and wealth, being hidden by wealthy and influential Saudi's, bin Laden and his entire family. Come on now, why have they not even found a single member of his family, other than for the son who showed up in Spain a few months ago. The guy is rich, very very rich, as is his family, as is his family well connected in Saudi government circles. In my opinion, Saudi Arabia is the REAL enemy. "I believe that banking institutions are more dangerous to our liberties than standing armies." - T. Jefferson

content: In the 1740's the House of Saud and the House of Wahhab entered into a treaty and binding marrage. The Wahhabi would dictate rthe Muslim Religion on the Arabian Peninsula , the Saudi would run government. Neither would interfear with the others realm. Fast forward almost three hundred years, fortunes wax and wane and, except for the unprotected traveler,no one cared what a bunch of Bedoin nomads did to each other. Then, there was OIL discovered in Arabia, then BIG OIL was discovered in the 1930's. It was diacovered by the Brits.. Treaties were made, America moved in, ARAMCO was fomed and BILLIONS went into the Saudi bank accounts. And the house of Wahhab? They has continued their teaching of THEIR VERSION of the Muslin religion. And, THEY rules the more primitive peoples minds. Now, the Wahhabi detest the Saudi, but honor their end of the 1740's treaty while seeking damned near any excuse to accuse the Saudi "Princes" os apostacy. The Saudi keep a very loyal "modern army" at their back, reducing the chances that the Wahhabi will turn on them. The Saudi Families, mostly modern, educated in Great Britian and at American Colleges, keep the religuious law in place. Otherwise they risk a revolt, as the religious know damned well the Saudi Familes are indeed apostates. So, what should OUR role be? Do we destabelize the House of Saud? If so, how do we influence who takes over? How can we restore order in the land on MECCA without a world wide open aNTI WESTERN "Jihad" against western culture and the great satan? All the while keeping Saudi oil flowing to Europe, Japan and India? We could cut off Saudi oil and would be moderately inconvenienced until the Cabnadians could take up the slack. Or we got sereous about north slope oil, Colorado Shale, Bakken oil, etc etc.. So here we are, and there they are. Solutions that keep the Arabian Oil flowing, or are we up for a several decade world widwe religious war?

content: In the 1740's the House of Saud and the House of Wahhab entered into a treaty and binding marrage. The Wahhabi would dictate rthe Muslim Religion on the Arabian Peninsula , the Saudi would run government. Neither would interfear with the others realm. Fast forward almost three hundred years, fortunes wax and wane and, except for the unprotected traveler,no one cared what a bunch of Bedoin nomads did to each other. Then, there was OIL discovered in Arabia, then BIG OIL was discovered in the 1930's. It was diacovered by the Brits.. Treaties were made, America moved in, ARAMCO was fomed and BILLIONS went into the Saudi bank accounts. And the house of Wahhab? They has continued their teaching of THEIR VERSION of the Muslin religion. And, THEY rules the more primitive peoples minds. Now, the Wahhabi detest the Saudi, but honor their end of the 1740's treaty while seeking damned near any excuse to accuse the Saudi "Princes" os apostacy. The Saudi keep a very loyal "modern army" at their back, reducing the chances that the Wahhabi will turn on them. The Saudi Families, mostly modern, educated in Great Britian and at American Colleges, keep the religuious law in place. Otherwise they risk a revolt, as the religious know damned well the Saudi Familes are indeed apostates. So, what should OUR role be? Do we destabelize the House of Saud? If so, how do we influence who takes over? How can we restore order in the land on MECCA without a world wide open aNTI WESTERN "Jihad" against western culture and the great satan? All the while keeping Saudi oil flowing to Europe, Japan and India? We could cut off Saudi oil and would be moderately inconvenienced until the Cabnadians could take up the slack. Or we got sereous about north slope oil, Colorado Shale, Bakken oil, etc etc.. So here we are, and there they are. Solutions that keep the Arabian Oil flowing, or are we up for a several decade world widwe religious war?
